root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 16-1-2, translated into en
root.data: Goal 16. Promote the emergence of peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, ensure access to justice for all and build, at all levels, effective, accountable and inclusive institutions16.1 Significantly reduce all forms of violence and associated death rates everywhere16.1.2. Proportion of victims who benefited from integrated carepercentage of victims of sexual violence having benefited from integrated careRatio between victims of sexual violence who received integrated care and all victims of sexual violence during a given periodNot available
